attributes.action: Ban additives and sweetners from childrens medicene
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ADDITIVES banned from childrens foods are being used in baby medicines including Calpol. 

A “cocktail” of synthetic dyes, preservatives and sweeteners was found in cough syrups, paracetamol tablets and teething gels aimed at the under-threes.

Some can cause allergies, asthma and skin reactions or have a mild laxative effect.

It seems food and drug manufacturers operate under different rules — which is crazy.

As parents, grandparents, aunts and uncles, we need to group together to get the government to stop this.  This loophole in the law should not exist!
